Before you make the payment ensure that you have inspected the apartment and you like what you saw. However, you have till 1 week from the moment you made this payment to Request a refund if;
The apartment is not exactly what was advertised online.
If you are not satisfied with the accommodation.
If the agent fails to honour their part of the agreement you both had,
Note: The equivalent of 1 week\'s rent will be deducted from the amount you paid before returning the rest to you.
